laboratory_examinations.findings: QTc, 435 ms (before cisapride); QTc, 480 ms (after cisapride); QTc, 731 ms (post-pacing); QTc, 594 ms (after drug withdrawal); QTc, 417 ms (six days drug-free equivalent to baseline)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: QT interval prolonged from 435 ms to 480 ms after cisapride; further prolonged to 731 ms during pacing; shortened to 594 ms after drug withdrawal and normalized to 417 ms after six days.
